question_text:
Question 10 
 
Visualize a cube that is held with one of the four body diagonals aligned to the vertical axis.  Rotate the 
cube about this axis such that its view remains unchanged.  The magnitude of the minimum angle of 
rotation is
(A) 
0
120
  
(B) 
0
60
(C) 
0
90
  
(D) 
0
180
  
Ans. 
(A)
.
Technical Section
.
Q.11 to Q.35 Carry ONE Mark Each
